name: Pokémon Procyon/Deneb
description:
Deneb and Procyon are Japanese Firered romhacks apart of the Altair/Sirius series.

They take place after the events of Vega, in a brand new, tropical region called Signet.

Your starter choices are once again Grass, Fire, and Water -- but this time, there's even more new Pokémon.

Will you step up to the challenge and explore this brand new Region?
